about.title: We are Monumentum!
about.text: In latin the word Monumentum means Monument that means something built to be remembered and commemorated. And that's exactlly what we want to do, build more than software to the next generations

howWeWork.title: Brief
howWeWork.text: We schedule a 1 hour meeting to get the customer brief and understand the problem.

howWeWork.title: Purpose
howWeWork.text: In 2 hours we reply with a <proposta> talking about costs and delivery time. At least we designate how many money we will spend to charity and the customer could <sugerir> the entity that will receive it

howWeWork.title: Happiness was created to be Shared <3
howWeWork.text: We will develop your dream as ours, and will delivery with the best quality that we can! At least we will movement the money to the choosen entity

openSource.title: From DEVs to DEVs
openSource.text: We trully believe that people is bigger than any kind of technology, and here we try to abstract all that we think necessary and good to reuse as micro-libraries, and all of it is opensource for anyone use and contribute
